FuncDef: The display bgp ipv6 bfd session command displays information about BFD sessions between BGP peers.
CLIs: display bgp ipv6 bfd session all
display bgp ipv6 bfd session peer <ipv6-address>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv6 address of a peer.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Displays all BFD sessions between BGP peers.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp ipv6 bfd session all
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The peer bfd and peer bfd enable commands can be used to change the parameters of BFD sessions between BGP peers. To view information about BFD sessions between BGP peers, run the display bgp ipv6 bfd session command.
